title: A Reckless Note
description: Passion, seduction, and my family’s secret that could change everything. I went looking for my missing brother, but instead, I found him: Kace August. He's dark. He's dangerous. He makes me want things I can’t have and brings me into a world of forbidden seduction. But I just can't seem to walk away.Book one in the Brilliance Trilogy.
author: Lisa Renee Jones
